Sentencas: Mixed conducting perovskites such as Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-delta (BSCF) are attracting interest for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: Electrochemical behaviors of BSCF surfaces, compared to a bulk one, have not been investigated yet.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: In this paper, electrochemical properties of BSCF were investigated by density functional theory (DFT).
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: We calculated barriers of the (011) BSCF terminated by Sr-Co-O, and compared them with the bulk values.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: We found that the oxygen vacancy migration energies within 6.87-9.59 angstrom in depth in the slab are nearly similar to the bulk values.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: The surface oxygen vacancy migration energies in (011) and (001) slabs of BSCF were compared.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: They have two values in the (011) BSCF and vacancies migrate under two models, which are different in terms of their geometries.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: However, there is a single value for the oxygen vacancy migration energy in the (001) BSCF.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: The surface oxygen vacancy formation energy of the (011) BSCF terminated by the O-O surface is much less than the bulk value.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: Oxygen vacancies can simply migrate to the O-O surface, because the migration energy required for jumping to the surface is very small.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling

Sentencas: Therefore, the presence and diffusion of vacancies in layers close to the O-O surface are more probable.
Titulo: A study on the formation and migration of oxygen vacancies in Ba0.5Sr0.5Co0.75Fe0.25O3-δ Perovskite surfaces by first-principles modelling
